overview: The movie stars George Bancroft, Mary Astor and Fredric March who are all excellent in their roles. The story begins as Joe Forziati (Bancroft), an Italian immigrant who has battled his way to success as a New York building contractor, decides to embark on a social career.
tagline: Fighting, Loving, Roaring His Way to Success on a Cyclondic Storm of Thrills and Romance..Packed With DRAMATIC DYNAMITE!
title: Ladies Love Brutes
